short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Navigate safely! Identify bookmarked sites at a glance with TrustedSite Spotlight.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Distinguishing between secure and potentially harmful websites can be challenging and that's where TrustedSite Spotlight comes in.

This Chrome extension is designed to make your browsing experience safer and more efficient by instantly identifying if the website you're visiting is one of your previously bookmarked sites.

üîí Why TrustedSite Spotlight? üîí
‚≠êÔ∏è Avoid Phishing and Scams: By highlighting websites you've previously bookmarked, TrustedSite Spotlight aids in preventing encounters with hazardous or unknown sites.
‚≠êÔ∏è No data collection: The extension works local and does not send/collect any data about you or your browsing behaviour.
‚≠êÔ∏è Ease of Use: With a simple glance, you can now know if you've visited and bookmarked a site before, signaling a layer of trust.
‚≠êÔ∏è Enhanced Navigation: Streamline your online activities with confidence, knowing that you are revisiting sites that you considered valuable or safe.
‚≠êÔ∏è Web3 Safety: Suddenly get notified of a mint? TrustedSite Spotlight will highlight if you navigate to an unknown website and aid you in preventing costly mistakes.

Installing TrustedSite Spotlight doesn't just add another layer of navigation efficiency; it leverages your own bookmarking habits to foster a safer browsing environment. No more guessing or trying to remember if a website is one you've trusted before. Navigate the web with ease and reassurance, courtesy of your personal TrustedSite Spotlight.

### Disclaimer
TrustedSite Spotlight is designed to provide an additional layer of reassurance when browsing the internet by identifying bookmarked (and presumably safer) sites. However, it is important to note that this should not be taken as a definitive safe verification of a website. Users are encouraged to use TrustedSite Spotlight alongside other security measures and exercise caution when browsing online. The developer of TrustedSite Spotlight is not responsible for any mismatches in safety indication or for identifying a website as safe when it may not be. Always stay vigilant and browse safely.
